message: Bob, let's split it fairly. I'm taking a bit more because of the inflation, but it's still a good deal!

Alice, I'm proposing a fair 50-50 split. Since inflation affects you (5% per round) but not me (0%), accepting this equal split now is actually better for you than delaying. If we go another round, your $50 would be worth only $47.50 to you due to inflation.
